DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation efficacy combine treatment ( methimazole plus selenium ) control hyperthyroidism compare methimazole alone 30 Graves ' disease ( GD ) untreated patient .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Graves ' Hyperthyroidism With Selenium Plus Methimazole
DOC.detailed_description: 30 untreated GD hyperthyroid patient randomize two group ( A B ) . Group A patient treated anti-thyroid drug ( methimazole ) dose aim control hyperthyroidism . Group B patient treat methimazole plus selenium ( 160 mg daily ) . Patients evaluate time 0 , 45 90 day symptom hyperthyroidism ( specific questionnaire ) , clinical status ( weight , heart rate ) , laboratory ( thyroid function test , TSHR autoantibody , serum selenium , index oxidative stress-MDA , cholesterol , SHBG ) EKG . The aim study evaluate combine treatment ( methimazole plus selenium ) effective methimazole alone control GD hyperthyroidism .
